ygData.subject: Re: Openglad 0.9 (Windows binaries) released!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... because of the way Gladiator handled input on DOS. They re fixed in CVS now. Thanks. ... latest from CVS compiles under Windows with no trouble anymore.

> Yup, those bugs were in the Linux version too. It was actually 
because of the way Gladiator handled input on DOS. They're fixed in 
CVS now.

Thanks.
 
> BTW, if anyone has Visual C++ and wants to compile the source, the 
latest from CVS compiles under Windows with no trouble anymore. There 
are directions in the INSTALL file.

*Whistles* I bought all of MS Visual Studio last year and installed 
all the software.
